name: The Source of All Evil
heading: null_s
description: Etna & Flonne's trial for the most powerful Overlord starts soon!

name: Overlord Cosplay
heading: null_s
description:
A mysterious voice came out of nowhere... 
Who was that?
And what's he up to!?

name: Hell's Kitchen
heading: null_s
description:
Laharl's transformation leads to an unpredictable 
turn of events...

name: Dark Hero's Sorrow
heading: null_s
description: Disgusted by her unreliable vassal, Girl Laharl decides to restore her former body on her own.

name: Storming the Dark Assembly
heading: null_s
description: With the very best bribe, Girl Laharl triumphantly heads to the Dark Assembly. But...

name: The Mischievous Academy
heading: null_s
description:
The next stage for training the most powerful Overlord 
takes us to the Evil Academy, where the values of good and evil are completely reversed...

name: Schoolhouse of Evil
heading: null_s
description: Having avoided expulsion at Mao's hands, life at the academy is finally about to begin. However...

name: Waste Incinerator
heading: null_s
description:
As the party attends class 
to become Delinquents, Mr. You-Know-Who stands in their way again!

name: Gold Mine of Desire
heading: null_s
description:
Today's lesson is on "Fundraising". 
What is Raspberyl's real purpose? She's definitely up to no good.

name: Fork of Destruction
heading: null_s
description: Finally, the ultimate class begins. Can the party graduate as true Delinquents?

name: Love is a War
heading: null_s
description:
What is power? What is love?
A bittersweet romantic comedy begins now! Please enjoy watching Love Revolution DISGAEA!

name: The Spirited Girl-in-Love
heading: null_s
description: Two girls suddenly show up to provide Rozalin with "love training" (?) in order to win back the runaway Adell. Heh!

name: Poisonous Swamp of Love
heading: null_s
description: In front of Rozalin is the trial of the poisonous swamp. In spite of her Status Ailment, she heads straight in along the rugged path of love!

name: Boiling Sea of Love
heading: null_s
description:
A girl in love will choose to risk her life. 
Giving up is not an option. 
Let the flames of love burn!

name: The Battlefield of Love
heading: null_s
description: After overcoming many challenges, Rozalin has become the warrior of love and is now heading to where Adell is waiting. But...?

name: Revolutionary Love Front
heading: null_s
description:
Adell has been freed, but Zenon has awakened.
Can the party save Rozalin...?

name: Snowy Road of Love
heading: null_s
description: The party is searching for the puppeteer behind the scenes when Mr. You-Know-Who shows up again...!!

name: Training Ground of Love
heading: null_s
description: After defeating the Dark Hero, Adell starts to search his memory for the truth.

name: Wretched Plain of Love
heading: null_s
description:
The true identity of the puppeteer turns out to be Former Archangel Vulcanus. 
What's he up to...?

name: Eternal Circuit of Love
heading: null_s
description:
Power is love and love is power.
Now, a trial for the love of two!!

name: Solving the Labyrinth
heading: null_s
description: Just as the permanence of love has been witnessed, news of a Prinny tragedy comes in... The Nether Detective stands forward...

name: The Monopoly
heading: null_s
description:
With clues concealed in a fog of confusion, another murder occurs. 
To save the Prinnies, a true Detective must emerge!

name: Sardine Fishery
heading: null_s
description: To unravel the truth behind the Prinny murders, the detective redoubles all efforts. But the barbarous crimes continue...

name: The Sad Crimson Moon
heading: null_s
description:
"Want to know whodunit?" 
A new character appears. 
Now the tide is turning.

name: The Sinful End
heading: null_s
description: The showdown, finally! In the name of the Prinny Instructor, here comes revenge!

name: Map of the Great War
heading: null_s
description:
In the words of the Seraph, a shocking truth is revealed... 
To save the world, the party must find the Five Original Overlords.

name: The Scorching Flame
heading: null_s
description: To revive the Five Original Overlords, Etna and her friends visit the Scorching Flame Netherworld. Will they accomplish their task...

name: Symbol of Awe
heading: null_s
description:
※※※Spoiler Alert※※※
The true identity of the Final Boss will be revealed here.

name: The Lost Haven
heading: null_s
description: 3 Original Overlords to go, but Killia seems to be distracted by something...

name: Claw Mark of the Tyrant
heading: null_s
description: Once again determined, Killia starts to tell of the epic animosity between him and his destined enemy, Tyrant Overlord Baal...

name: Sanctuary of the Fist
heading: null_s
description:
The one who shows up before Killia is Zeroken, his junior disciple.
Shocking sexy beam episode

name: Closed Heart
heading: null_s
description:
2 Original Overlords to go. 
For the battle against Tyrant Overlord Baal, Killia hurries forward with his friends. But...

name: Feast of Curry
heading: null_s
description:
Usalia and Seraphina just won't wake up.
What on earth happened to them...!?

name: The Battle of Fate
heading: null_s
description: All 5 Original Overlords have been awakened, but the dark solar meteor shower is coming. The one who comes to save the day appears. But who is this savior...

name: A Stage Staged
heading: null_s
description: The battle against Tyrant Overlord Baal has begun. Joy at forming the dream team is short-lived. Battle must continue.

name: Holy Puppet Show
heading: null_s
description: It's the final stage of Overlord training. Before the battle with the Final Boss can begin, a final trial awaits. However...

name: Tree of Stardust
heading: null_s
description:
The next opponent is Flonne, the warrior of love. 
But an accident happens on her long-awaited debut.

name: The Crossing
heading: null_s
description:
Flonne keeps transforming.
Her power of love that makes the impossible possible finally reveals itself!

name: Majin's Armory
heading: null_s
description: As the opponent of the final trial, Etna now stands in the way! And what is her true hidden power...

name: The Fateful Divide
heading: null_s
description: Completely exhausted in the final trial, Flonne and her friends are now targeted by evil hands...!

name: Indelible Scars
heading: null_s
description:
Laharl announced a gathering 
during Flonne and Etna's absence! 
There was no time for grief 
as new enemies were making their move.

name: Guidepost for the Lost
heading: null_s
description:
Let Valvatorez join and 
bring the brainwashed Prinnies 
back to normal.

name: Hero's Hunting Ground
heading: null_s
description:
It appeared as though the fuss with the Prinnies and the Red Moon 
was down to the Super Hero Aurum. 
However, an even greater evil 
was lurking behind.

name: Creeping Abyss
heading: null_s
description:
A powerful Prinny Bomb was created 
to devastate the world. 
The party sets out to the Red Moon 
to save the Prinnies and the world.

name: Beckoning Tragedy
heading: null_s
description:
The expansion of the Prinny Bomb 
was beyond expectation. 
What will Laharl and his friends do?

name: Realm of Absolute Darkness
heading: null_s
description:
The mastermind has finally been cornered. 
After all these trials and hardships, it's finally showtime!

name: The Tombstone of the Fool
heading: null_s
description:
Axel showed up to interfere yet again 
as Laharl's party was about to 
challenge the Final Boss. 
Something wasn't quite right about him...

name: Instantaneous Easter
heading: null_s
description:
With enough medicine for two in hand, the party hurried back to where Etna was. 
Finally, the rowdy times 
were about to return...

name: Imminent Death
heading: null_s
description:
Vulcanus, in the company of Fallen Celestial Hosts. 
But here comes the counterattack from 
an angry Etna!

name: The Great War Festival
heading: null_s
description:
The memories of all those battles 
keep coming back. 
What will become of the training of the strongest Overlord 
and the final battle...

name: The Five Protagonists Assembled?!
heading: null_s
description:
The five protagonists, including Laharl,
have formed the Netherworld Force - DISGAEA V,
united as one!
Has something gone wrong again...?

name: Love and Justice!
heading: null_s
description:
To stop the Netherworld from collapsing,
Flonne and Etna stand up
to confront the furious Laharl.
Flonne seems to have a clever plan.

name: Fierce Fighting Machine
heading: null_s
description:
Just like Laharl,
Adell is also furious about Mao.
There is only one way
to stop this fierce fighting machine...!

name: Unexpected
heading: null_s
description:
Although Adell and Laharl
are mad at Mao,
Flonne and Etna tried to hear his side of the story,
however, Mao seems to be enraged also...

name: Netherworld Extinction?
heading: null_s
description:
Something is odd about
what the five protagonists had to say...
However, everyone has already become
uncontrollably angry...

name: A New Show?!
heading: null_s
description:
The grand finale of
Netherworld Force DISGAEA V?
Etna is planning to
start a new show...

name: Reunion with Them
heading: null_s
description:
Rozalin sensed danger and
at that moment
an unexpected character appeared.

name: The Search for Adell...
heading: null_s
description:
Having encountered Fake Zenon again,
Etna, Flonne, and Rozalin
decided to search for Adell together...

name: Adell's Determination
heading: null_s
description:
Hearing Salvatore's words,
Adell decided to make up with Rozalin.
Will they
be able to reconcile?

name: Another Rare Guest?
heading: null_s
description:
Seeing Rozalin defending Fake Zenon,
Adell left on her own.
A rare guest
appeared before the squad…

name: A New Problem!
heading: null_s
description:
After the squad accepted their new member (Lucy),
they started to discuss their future...
when Prinnies brought them some
shocking news!

name: The Netherworld War
heading: null_s
description:
Flonne and Etna
experienced Laharl's wrath first hand.
Will they
ever be able to find Laharl?

name: Using the Boss to Test Skills
heading: null_s
description:
Before challenging Laharl,
the squad decided to test their mettle with a boss...
when a very familiar figure
appeared in front of them!

name: The Final Boss and the Final Showdown
heading: null_s
description:
The squad only wanted to test their strength,
to their surprise, they ended up fighting the final boss...
Will their journey come to an end
before they even find Laharl?

name: Spreading War
heading: null_s
description:
The squad has found Laharl and the others’ location,
thanks to the clues that Flonne and Etna discovered!
Can they
stop the war?

name: A New Battlefield?
heading: null_s
description:
Laharl's war has come to an end,
but now news of another "war"
between Valvatorez and Killia
is spreading…

name: Culinary Contest
heading: null_s
description:
In this culinary contest,
all violence is strictly forbidden.
All participants are
ready for a culinary duel!

name: A Chef's Spirit
heading: null_s
description:
What is cooking?
Cooking is a clash between ingredients,
a pilgrimage to find the ultimate form of dishes,
and an adventure to learn the essence of food.

name: Rare Guests
heading: null_s

name: And the Winner is...?!
heading: null_s
description:
The cooking battle is in full swing.
Who will win this
glorious battle?!

name: Adell's Objective
heading: null_s
description:
What exactly is Adell doing
in the "Love Lab",
a place that clearly
reeks of conspiracies?

name: Love Event Starts!
heading: null_s
description:
Adell has started a loving event.
What kind of event is he holding,
in this facility that can satisfy
the need of anyone?

name: Love Event Is ON!!
heading: null_s
description:
Rozalin finally met with Adell.
Whey they were busy bickering,
a love contest with Adell at the center
has somehow gotten underway!

name: Mao's Conspiracy
heading: null_s
description:
Despite the chaos,
the squad successfully resolved their problems...
Now Mao has appeared out of nowhere, just what is he planning?!

name: Super Overlord Love Cell
heading: null_s
description:
After Mao became one with the ultimate cell,
he was supposed to resonate with the love energy and
become even more powerful.
However...

heading: null_s
description: null_s

name: Gate of HL
heading: null_s
description: null_s

name: Gate of Gems (Hum.)
heading: null_s
description: null_s

heading: null_s
description: null_s

heading: EP 11

heading: EP 12 Part I

description: null_s

heading: EP 1

heading: EP 2

heading: EP 3

heading: EP 4
description: null_s

heading: EP 5
description: null_s

heading: EP 6
description: null_s

heading: EP 1
description: null_s

name: Demon General
heading: EP 2

name: His Name is Zeroken
heading: EP 3

name: Yellow, Rabbits, and Curry
heading: EP 4

heading: EP 5

heading: EP 6

heading: EP 7

heading: EP 8

heading: EP 9

name: The Memorable Special Sweet Curry
heading: EP 10
description: null_s

heading: EP 11

heading: EP 12

name: The Two Killias
heading: EP 13

name: Dedicated to the Precious People
heading: Final Episode

name: Theory of Reincarnation
heading: EP 1
description: null_s

name: Investigation Start!
heading: null_s
description:
Gordon, the Defender of Earth, arrives in the Netherworld to 
investigate the disappearance of Prinnies! 
What awaits him is...

name: Search for the Hero!
heading: null_s

name: Enemies Emerge!
heading: null_s
description:
Demons stand in the way 
of the search for Almaz! 
And the person controlling them is...

name: Almaz is the Overlord!?
heading: null_s
description:
The true mastermind is 
Almaz, whom they've been 
searching for?

name: Strategic Retreat!
heading: null_s
description:
Defeated by Almaz, the party has to fight through 
their demonic pursuers 
in order to retreat.

name: Information Gathering!
heading: null_s
description:
The party starts to 
gather information about 
the hero title in order to 
deal with the demon title.

name: Another Hero!
heading: null_s
description:
Knowing the weaknesses 
of the demon title, the party decides to 
find the hero title.

name: Almaz's Title!
heading: null_s
description:
Don Joaquin entrusts the title of hero 
to the party 
who have overcome the trial.

name: Almaz Once More!
heading: null_s
description:
The party confronts Almaz again 
with the hero title, only to find that 
Almaz's title has been upgraded to "Knock-off Overlord"!

name: Showdown with the Great Overlord!
heading: null_s
description:
The demon title that escaped from Almaz 
has materialized! 
Thus becoming Prinny 
the Great Overlord!

name: Prinny Bomb!
heading: null_s
description:
The Prinny bomb has already begun
the detonation countdown!
At this critical moment,
Almaz has a great idea!

name: Kurtis' Determination!
heading: null_s
description:
In order to enter
the core of the Prinny Bomb,
Kurtis proposes a
self-sacrificing plan!

name: Persuasion Begins!
heading: null_s
description:
The group managed to get into
the core of the Prinny Bomb
and started their persuasion plan!

name: Vato Brothers!
heading: null_s
description:
Outnumbered by enemies
and facing a ticking clock,
they are now confronted by the Vato Brothers!
What exactly are they up to?

name: The Final Showdown!
heading: null_s
description:
As the squad persuades the Prinnies,
the counterfeit Prinny Baal,
who possesses the power to destroy the world,
has appeared!

name: Follow your feelings
heading: null_s
description: Maybe it's because of the Santa costume, but Usalia and the Mage sense a mysterious presence. What will it reveal to them?

name: Knew it Was You
heading: null_s
description:
Prinnies bearing gifts were seen by Laharl and the others. 
Could they be the masterminds behind all this?

name: Evil Academy's Holy Night
heading: null_s
description: The Evil Academy on Christmas Eve. Cheer and goodwill are cut short for Laharl and his friends as they encounter a Delinquent Teacher.

name: Miser's Collection
heading: null_s
description:
Usalia and the Mage are worried they won't make it to Christmas on time. 
What would Laharl, as Santa, think about that?

name: Xmas Hater
heading: null_s
description: Christmas is drawing near, but the presents are only halfway ready. Finally, the evil puppeteer reveals himself in front of the anxious Nether Santas!

name: Majin Etna Advent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Mirror Cake and Prinnies
heading: null_s
description:
Mirror Cake is an indispensable part of 
the traditional festivities in Snow Melody Village. 
However, no one could have foreseen the turmoil 
the Mirror Cake would actually cause...

name: Mirror Cake Lab
heading: null_s
description:
An agonized scream echoed throughout the Netherworld. 
Fubuki, and others, rushed to the scene. 
What they saw was...

name: The Avenger of Traditional Cuisine
heading: null_s
description:
With Mao on board, it should have been easy to 
take back the New Year Food. 
But to everyone's surprise, Mr. You-Know-Who stood in the way.

name: Shinobi's Resolve?
heading: null_s
description:
Fubuki and his friends were making steady progress in reclaiming food 
from the Mirror Cake Prinny. 
But just as they thought everything was going well, something strange happened to Rozalin.

name: The Place Where It All Began
heading: null_s
description:
The party arrived at Snow Melody Village, where everything had begun. 
The fight against the Mirror Cake Prinny 
had finally come to an end!

name: A Tanuki's Lucky Balls
heading: null_s
description:
In front of the Prinny Kurtis, who was feeling the limits of his power, a Prinny with an old map 
appeared.

name: Bambrooms of Mt. Demon
heading: null_s
description:
In the mountains hides a legendary ingredient 
that has been struggling 
...no, evolving 
since the beginning of time!

name: Staff of Change
heading: null_s
description:
Kurtis is frustrated by his 
constant failures and begins 
searching for the next item 
to shake off his anxiety.

name: Ra's Mirror Cake
heading: null_s
description:
Don't tell me... 
Mirror Cake again.

name: On Being a Hero
heading: null_s
description:
What's the difference? Such harsh words 
cut him deep. 
Suddenly, Mr. You-Know-Who appeared 
in front of a confused Kurtis!?

name: Anniversary Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Modified Prinny Conquest Battle
heading: null_s
description:
The Prinnies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: NBP Grand Opening!
heading: null_s
description:
A flyer 
reached Laharl. 
It was the beginning of a nightmare.

name: Demon Cutie Advent
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl and her friends are making their way 
through the intricate NBP venue. 
Just then, a second assassin 
shows up.

name: Beauty Hero
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl forges onward with all her strength 
in order to regain her original form. 
Will her next opponent 
be an easier one?

name: Definition of Beauty
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl is tired from 
a series of perverse battles. 
Hopefully the next opponent 
will be an upstanding one...

name: On True Beauty
heading: null_s
description:
Finally, the finale. 
Girl Laharl vows to 
beat Mid-Boss to win the championship 
and return to her original form.

name: Pure Flonne Advent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Course on Chaos, Part 1
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl, the legendary graduate. 
Her attempts to inspire new graduates from the Evil Academy 
to follow in her footsteps 
begins now.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 2
heading: null_s
description:
While training with Zeroken, the group attempts to move forward. 
However, a 2nd substitute Delinquent Teacher 
stands in their way.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 3
heading: null_s
description:
The group overcomes the 2nd substitute Delinquent Teacher 
and moves on. 
But for how long 
will their success continue?

name: Course on Chaos, Part 4
heading: null_s
description:
With all modules completed. 
The only thing left is to go back to the academy. 
At least that was the plan...

name: Course on Chaos, Part 5
heading: null_s
description:
Ms. Raspberyl spoke 
to Kyoko and Asuka, who had no idea what they were lacking, even after the brawl.

name: Raid Battle
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Reflection Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Modified Prinny Conquest Battle
heading: null_s
description:
The Prinnies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Path of Admiring Sakura
heading: null_s
description:
"Let's go see the sakura!" 
Sicily had no idea of the 
sequence of events that these 
words would set in motion.

name: Magic Cutie Techniques
heading: null_s
description:
Despite Sicily's confusion at suddenly 
transforming into a Magic Cutie, Pure Flonne didn't hesitate to slaughter the enemies. 
But what about the sakura?

name: Salvation of Love
heading: null_s
description:
The group chases after Darktina 
with Pure Sicily in the lead. 
All the while, Pure Sicily keeps practicing her Magic Cutie Techniques.

name: Love's Miracle
heading: null_s
description:
Darktina's blow 
hit Love Oracle 
causing great damage. The fate of Love Oracle... 
what will it be!?

name: On Being a Magic Cutie
heading: null_s
description:
Together with their new companion, Puretina, the party 
goes to the final battle 
to stop Love Oracle.

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: A Challenge from the Prism Rangers!
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Netherworld Cat Cafe
heading: null_s
description:
A cat cafe has opened in the Netherworld! 
Someone unexpected appears 
in front of Etna, who is only there 
for the desserts and has no interest in cats.

name: Partnership
heading: null_s
description:
Virunga, the manager, has regained his composure. 
But why did Virunga open 
a cat cafe in the Netherworld?

name: Association for Feline Rights
heading: null_s
description:
Before everyone knows it, the cats have escaped from the cafe!? 
Where have the cats gone!!

name: A Third Party Emerges!?
heading: null_s
description:
Prinnies suddenly 
rush in. 
Will a three-way battle 
involving the Association for Feline Rights begin?

name: A Bro's True Intentions
heading: null_s
description:
The party takes a break 
after a heated battle with the Sardine Doods, but then they notice something strange.

name: Bloodis Advent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Fairy, Conquest Version
heading: null_s
description:
The Fairies had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Undead, Conquest Version
heading: null_s
description:
The Undead had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Sludge, Conquest Version
heading: null_s
description:
The Sludges had been mercilessly remodeled 
by Mao, purely for fun. 
They had gained enhancement, but at a terrible cost, and now they wanted vengeance...

name: Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Sister Artina Advent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Bread Eating Competition
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl aims to win the championship 
to abolish short shorts. 
However, the road to victory 
is not an easy one.

name: Scavenger Hunt
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl aims to win the championship 
with the help of Fuka and Ayame. 
But the opponent in the next event 
is not going to be easy to deal with!

name: Three-legged Race
heading: null_s
description:
The fest-evil is entering its long middle stretch. Tiredness begins to show 
on the faces of Raspberyl and the others. 
Then Mr. You-Know-Who appears 
before them.

name: Gymnastic Formation?
heading: null_s
description:
Next up: Gymnastic Formation!
At last, an event other than running. 
Raspberyl and her friends 
should be happy about this...

name: Chicken Fight
heading: null_s
description:
A clear victory!
This startling declaration from Mao 
baffled the clueless Raspberyl 
and her equally clumsy friends.

name: Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: The Game Begins
heading: null_s
description:
Laharl and his partners
arrived at the Video Game Expo venue
and experienced a certain
new game...

name: Overlord Vanquisher
heading: null_s
description:
Who is exactly
"the chosen one"
Asagi mentioned...?

name: Grudge
heading: null_s
description:
The squad is on their way to the Overlord's Castle.
However, Asagi's
footsteps are weighed down.

name: Doomsday Overlord's Castle
heading: null_s
description:
The squad arrives at
the castle of Asagi, the Doomsday Overlord.
The final battle
is about to start!

name: Behind the Scenes
heading: null_s
description:
The heroes defeated the Overlord and beat the game!
Since this is only a demo version,
there are no post-game credits. Stay safe and
return to the real world.

name: Monster on the Prowl
heading: null_s
description:
The bright sun, the white sand, and the
clear sea!
This is a great place to soak up the summertime.
But things won't be that simple...

name: Search Monster
heading: null_s
description:
To find the monster,
Meaver, Etna, and
Emizel are searching along the coast.
At this point, Prinnies are...

name: Not Done Playing
heading: null_s
description:
The squad has defeated a number of minions,
but the one behind all this is nowhere to be found.
The sweltering heat and the lack of desserts
is making Etna impatient...

name: Monster Discovered?
heading: null_s
description:
The group has accepted a new member.
ow they can definitely defeat
the giant monster!
Soon, the seaside resort will be open again!

name: For the Seaside Resort
heading: null_s
description:
The Giant Monster (?) Desco
and Meaver had a fierce fight,
and the seaside restored its peace.

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data - Common

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data - Rare

name: Qixi Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Awakened Killia’s Descent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Start Treasure Hunt
heading: null_s
description:
In order to find Etna,
Girl Laharl and her partners arrived at the seaside
and started collecting clues at the Sea Club.

name: Treasure Island Labyrinth
heading: null_s
description:
Led by Merlin,
Girl Laharl and her partners made it to Treasure Island.
There, they encountered
treasure-hunting rivals.

name: Lifeguard
heading: null_s
description: Qixi Special Battle

name: Real Treasure Hunters
heading: null_s
description:
Having escaped a close call,
Girl Laharl and her partners
continued their journey towards the depths of Treasure Island,
wondering what exactly they will find.

name: The True Treasure
heading: null_s
description:
There is no treasure in the ruins,
only the ocean lays ahead of the squad.
Where exactly is
the treasure?

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Special Commemoration Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Eliminating Transformed Succubi
heading: null_s
description:
Purely for his own amusement,
Mao has ruthlessly transformed Succubi!
Though their powers have increased,
they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: Long-awaited Summer Fest
heading: null_s
description:
Valvatorez is devastated to hear
that the sardine fireworks
are not completed yet.
What exactly has happened?

name: Patrons of Summer Fest
heading: null_s
description:
Valvatorez told Yukimaru
that a summer fest just isn’t the same
without sardines.
Does a summer fest really need sardines...?

name: Roadside Stalls
heading: null_s
description:
The squad wandered around the square
when their tummies began to rumble.
At that moment, the sweet aroma of food
attracted them to a roadside stall.

name: Best Date Location?
heading: null_s
description:
The sardine fireworks are still far from complete.
Meanwhile, Hibana
is tailing after a couple
who are enjoying the festival.

name: Nearly Time for Fireworks
heading: null_s
description:
Valvatorez brought
everyone to a perfect place to enjoy the fireworks.
There, a group of Prinnies
were performing a strange dance...

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Summoning the Seven Deadly Sins
heading: null_s
description:
The Summoner's Pot is said to
have the power to summon beings from another realm.
Is it really
possible?

name: The Missing Ones
heading: null_s
description:
As the name "the Seven Deadly Sins" implies,
there should be seven members.
But where are the others?

name: An Unexpected Team
heading: null_s
description:
Laharl had no idea that
the outcome would be decided
by such an unreasonable battle.
Maybe the next fight will be a bit fairer?

name: Fashion Contest
heading: null_s
description:
Were they just playing around all this time?
The real fight is finally on.
It's time for the female members to show their true skills!

name: Contest Results
heading: null_s
description:
There is no way that all of the battles with
the Seven Deadly Sins can end in total defeat.
Laharl decided
to challenge Meliodas again...

name: Linked Memorial Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: A New Mission!
heading: null_s
description:
We have an emergency!
A magic mirror has appeared in the Netherworld!
Go and find out why!

name: Matt Heads to the Castle
heading: null_s
description:
The squad heads to Laharl’s castle,
in hopes of receiving his help.
When they arrived, they heard some weird noises.

name: Magic Mirror Scramble
heading: null_s
description:
Just as the Cutie V Rangers and Matt are busy
looking for Matt's Dark Mirror,
that guy
appeared in front of them!!

name: Another Hero?
heading: null_s
description:
When the squad was busy purifying
Matt's Dark Mirror,
another hero appeared...

name: Matt's Wish
heading: null_s
description:
The final battle for
ownership of Matt's Dark Mirror has finally begun!
Defeat enemies with the powers of love and justice!

name: Special Battle - feat. Matt
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Halloween Monster
heading: null_s
description:
On Halloween,
a terrifying sound resonates across the entire Netherworld.
The sounds are actually coming from a large number of...

name: The Witch of Halloween
heading: null_s
description:
A window is broken, and glass shards are scattered all over the place.
Who on earth
has broken into the castle?!

name: Making a Lantern
heading: null_s
description:
The squad is chasing after Jennifer,
escaping with a cauldron in her hands.
A sturdy gate stands in their way...
It's the time for your axe, Artina!

name: A New Halloween Game
heading: null_s
description:
Want to take a little break?
How about playing a game perfectly
suited to the Halloween atmosphere?

name: Halloween Party
heading: null_s
description:
The squad has finally caught up with
Jennifer. Can they
destroy the cauldron and
stop the panic caused by the Zombies?

name: Eliminating Transformed Gargoyles
heading: null_s
description:
Purely for his own amusement,
Mao has ruthlessly transformed the Gargoyles!
Though their powers have increased,
they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Ritual Questions
heading: null_s
description:
A large number of guests
have come to the party for
the first anniversary of Disgaea RPG.
The party is about to start!

name: 1st Post-Game Show
heading: null_s
description:
Though the opening ceremony was canceled,
the main event of the party
is just about to begin!
Spin the Wheel!

name: 2nd Post-Game Show
heading: null_s
description:
The content of this show,
is completely determined by the roulette wheel.
Who will spin it?
What will the outcome be?

name: 3rd Post-Game Show
heading: null_s
description:
Seraphina is angry because she
didn’t get to see the clip she wanted to.
With her unwavering determination,
she walks straight to the roulette wheel.

name: Finale Time
heading: null_s
description:
The party is about to end,
everyone has had a great time.
Killia goes to the stage and
prepares to give the closing speech to the guests...

name: Thank You Fest Special Battle ①
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Thank You Fest Special Battle ②
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Eliminating Transformed Shrooms
heading: null_s
description:
Purely for his own amusement,
Mao has ruthlessly transformed Shrooms!
Though their powers have increased,
they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: U.D.T Training
heading: null_s
description: None

name: A Crisis at Christmas?!
heading: null_s
description:
Adell is rushing around, preparing for the
Christmas party.
Will his decoration
work be a success?

name: A New Santa!
heading: null_s
description:
Adell and his partners
cleared up Noel's misunderstanding and
chased after Usalia.
Where exactly did Usalia go?

name: Expanding Chaos
heading: null_s
description:
Adell and his partners chased after Usalia,
who had turned into Dark Santa.
The chase itself
was causing more and more chaos.

name: Christmas Eve Carnage
heading: null_s
description:
In the end, Adell and his partners caught up with Usalia.
Just when Adell thought he could get his presents back,
she appeared.

name: A Christmas Full of Suspense
heading: null_s
description:
Adell and Rozalin
are friends again.
Now, the squad just needs to get the presents back
and restore Usalia to her former self!

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: New Year Visit
heading: null_s
description:
Sicily and her friends went out for a New Year's visit.
She was after a legendary
talisman that is said to tell the future with 100% accuracy.
What will their fate be? Good, or bad?

name: Prinny God's Boon
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl was taken captive
and Sicily is deeply troubled,
not knowing what to do.
Could this be caused by the divination...

name: A Loving Brother
heading: null_s
description:
Having gained her new power,
Sicily chased after the talisman.
As she advanced,
she met an unexpected person.

name: Sister's Superiority
heading: null_s
description:
Just when Sicily is anxiously
trying to restore Laharl back to normal,
the Strongest Sister
comes to block her path?

name: Stop the Wedding!
heading: null_s
description:
Having overcome countless obstacles,
Sicily and her partners continued on.
Can they reach the wedding venue
before Girl Laharl says her vows?!

name: Eliminating Transformed Felynns
heading: null_s
description:
Purely for his own amusement,
Mao has ruthlessly transformed Felynns!
Though their powers have increased,
they have lost something important and set out a quest for vengeance...

name: Pringer X's Descent
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Netherworld New Year Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: U.D.T Training
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Normal Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Rare Boss
heading: null_s
description: Raid Battle Data

name: Another Protagonist Contest?
heading: null_s
description:
That zombie
protagonist has appeared in front
of Laharl again?!

name: Clash of Forces
heading: null_s
description:
The fierce fight against Zed
spread throughout the entire Netherworld.
This commotion attracted the attention
of a certain demon...

name: Hopes of a Happy Ending
heading: null_s
description:
Zed is determined
to show Laharl
his true power.
Will he impress Laharl?

name: Grand Finale?
heading: null_s
description:
The situation doesn’t look good.
And Zed decides to
play his trump card.

name: Woes of Protagonists
heading: null_s
description:
Despite endless
messy battles in the past,
the protagonists
are destined to fight with all their might once more!

name: Birthday Celebration Special Battle
heading: null_s
description: None

name: Follow your feelings
heading: null_s
description: Maybe it's because of the Santa costume, but Usalia and the Mage sense a mysterious presence. What will it reveal to them?

name: Knew it Was You
heading: null_s
description:
Prinnies bearing gifts were seen by Laharl and the others. 
Could they be the masterminds behind all this?

name: Evil Academy's Holy Night
heading: null_s
description: The Evil Academy on Christmas Eve. Cheer and goodwill are cut short for Laharl and his friends as they encounter a Delinquent Teacher.

name: Miser's Collection
heading: null_s
description:
Usalia and the Mage are worried they won't make it to Christmas on time. 
What would Laharl, as Santa, think about that?

name: Xmas Hater
heading: null_s
description: Christmas is drawing near, but the presents are only halfway ready. Finally, the evil puppeteer reveals himself in front of the anxious Nether Santas!

name: Reminiscence Area
heading: null_s
description: Christmas Events Reminiscence

name: Mirror Cake and Prinnies
heading: null_s
description:
Mirror Cake is an indispensable part of 
the traditional festivities in Snow Melody Village. 
However, no one could have foreseen the turmoil 
the Mirror Cake would actually cause...

name: Mirror Cake Lab
heading: null_s
description:
An agonized scream echoed throughout the Netherworld. 
Fubuki, and others, rushed to the scene. 
What they saw was...

name: The Avenger of Traditional Cuisine
heading: null_s
description:
With Mao on board, it should have been easy to 
take back the New Year Food. 
But to everyone's surprise, Mr. You-Know-Who stood in the way.

name: Shinobi's Resolve?
heading: null_s
description:
Fubuki and his friends were making steady progress in reclaiming food 
from the Mirror Cake Prinny. 
But just as they thought everything was going well, something strange happened to Rozalin.

name: The Place Where It All Began
heading: null_s
description:
The party arrived at Snow Melody Village, where everything had begun. 
The fight against the Mirror Cake Prinny 
had finally come to an end!

name: Reminiscence Area
heading: null_s
description: New Year Events Reminiscence

name: A Tanuki's Lucky Balls
heading: null_s
description:
In front of the Prinny Kurtis, who was feeling the limits of his power, a Prinny with an old map 
appeared.

name: Bambrooms of Mt. Demon
heading: null_s
description:
In the mountains hides a legendary ingredient 
that has been struggling 
...no, evolving 
since the beginning of time!

name: Staff of Change
heading: null_s
description:
Kurtis is frustrated by his 
constant failures and begins 
searching for the next item 
to shake off his anxiety.

name: Ra's Mirror Cake
heading: null_s
description:
Don't tell me... 
Mirror Cake again.

name: On Being a Hero
heading: null_s
description:
What's the difference? Such harsh words 
cut him deep. 
Suddenly, Mr. You-Know-Who appeared 
in front of a confused Kurtis!?

name: Reminiscence Area
heading: null_s
description: Kurtis Events Reminiscence

name: NBP Grand Opening!
heading: null_s
description:
A flyer 
reached Laharl. 
It was the beginning of a nightmare.

name: Demon Cutie Advent
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl and her friends are making their way 
through the intricate NBP venue. 
Just then, a second assassin 
shows up.

name: Beauty Hero
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl forges onward with all her strength 
in order to regain her original form. 
Will her next opponent 
be an easier one?

name: Definition of Beauty
heading: null_s
description:
Girl Laharl is tired from 
a series of perverse battles. 
Hopefully the next opponent 
will be an upstanding one...

name: On True Beauty
heading: null_s
description:
Finally, the finale. 
Girl Laharl vows to 
beat Mid-Boss to win the championship 
and return to her original form.

name: Reminiscence Area
heading: null_s
description: Beauty Events Reminiscence

name: Course on Chaos, Part 1
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl, the legendary graduate. 
Her attempts to inspire new graduates from the Evil Academy 
to follow in her footsteps 
begins now.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 2
heading: null_s
description:
While training with Zeroken, the group attempts to move forward. 
However, a 2nd substitute Delinquent Teacher 
stands in their way.

name: Course on Chaos, Part 3
heading: null_s
description:
The group overcomes the 2nd substitute Delinquent Teacher 
and moves on. 
But for how long 
will their success continue?

name: Course on Chaos, Part 4
heading: null_s
description:
With all modules completed. 
The only thing left is to go back to the academy. 
At least that was the plan...

name: Course on Chaos, Part 5
heading: null_s
description:
Ms. Raspberyl spoke 
to Kyoko and Asuka, who had no idea what they were lacking, even after the brawl.

name: Reminiscence Area
heading: null_s
description: Asuka Cranekick's Reminiscence Area

name: Path of Admiring Sakura
heading: null_s
description:
"Let's go see the sakura!" 
Sicily had no idea of the 
sequence of events that these 
words would set in motion.

name: Magic Cutie Techniques
heading: null_s
description:
Despite Sicily's confusion at suddenly 
transforming into a Magic Cutie, Pure Flonne didn't hesitate to slaughter the enemies. 
But what about the sakura?

name: Salvation of Love
heading: null_s
description:
The group chases after Darktina 
with Pure Sicily in the lead. 
All the while, Pure Sicily keeps practicing her Magic Cutie Techniques.

name: Love's Miracle
heading: null_s
description:
Darktina's blow 
hit Love Oracle 
causing great damage. The fate of Love Oracle... 
what will it be!?

name: On Being a Magic Cutie
heading: null_s
description:
Together with their new companion, Puretina, the party 
goes to the final battle 
to stop Love Oracle.

name: Reminiscence Area
heading: null_s
description: Love Oracle's Reminiscence Area

name: Netherworld Cat Cafe
heading: null_s
description:
A cat cafe has opened in the Netherworld! 
Someone unexpected appears 
in front of Etna, who is only there 
for the desserts and has no interest in cats.

name: Partnership
heading: null_s
description:
Virunga, the manager, has regained his composure. 
But why did Virunga open 
a cat cafe in the Netherworld?

name: Association for Feline Rights
heading: null_s
description:
Before everyone knows it, the cats have escaped from the cafe!? 
Where have the cats gone!!

name: A Third Party Emerges!?
heading: null_s
description:
Prinnies suddenly 
rush in. 
Will a three-way battle 
involving the Association for Feline Rights begin?

name: A Bro's True Intentions
heading: null_s
description:
The party takes a break 
after a heated battle with the Sardine Doods, but then they notice something strange.

name: Reminiscence Area
heading: null_s
description: Virunga's Reminiscence Area

name: Bread Eating Competition
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl aims to win the championship 
to abolish short shorts. 
However, the road to victory 
is not an easy one.

name: Scavenger Hunt
heading: null_s
description:
Raspberyl aims to win the championship 
with the help of Fuka and Ayame. 
But the opponent in the next event 
is not going to be easy to deal with!

name: Three-legged Race
heading: null_s
description:
The fest-evil is entering its long middle stretch. Tiredness begins to show 
on the faces of Raspberyl and the others. 
Then Mr. You-Know-Who appears 
before them.

name: Gymnastic Formation?
heading: null_s
description:
Next up: Gymnastic Formation!
At last, an event other than running. 
Raspberyl and her friends 
should be happy about this...

name: Chicken Fight
heading: null_s
description:
A clear victory!
This startling declaration from Mao 
baffled the clueless Raspberyl 
and her equally clumsy friends.

name: Reminiscence Area
heading: null_s
description: Iris's Reminiscence Area
